content.rendered:
Photo via Ryan Wong on Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, Calvin Koepke FREES ALL THE THEMES, a new premium plugin from Jesse Petersen, and Brian Gardner chats design on StudioPress Live.

Themes

Calvin makes all his Genesis themes available (for free, of course) on GitHub.

You can now get all my Genesis themes on GitHub. Enjoy! https://t.co/4dRh8c2vtP

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) February 27, 2017

…and, as you might expect, they’re going down well.

30 stars on the free themes repo today. Thanks all you cool #genesiswp people!

— Calvin (@cjkoepke) February 27, 2017

Brian Gardner is working on a new theme for StudioPress.

Current status: designing a theme for @studiopress. #genesiswp

— Brian Gardner (@bgardner) March 1, 2017

Showcase

Matt Whiteley with a new site for himself, whiteleydesigns.com

Just launched my fully revamped site – https://t.co/MplAGZoTSm. Built with #genesiswp of course. Check it out!

— Matt Whiteley (@whiteleydesigns) March 2, 2017

Majorie Ray for hspnaturetoys.com

Happy to launch our https://t.co/l7RuCgPbMb #wordpress #genesiswp #utilitypro website!

— Marjorie Ray (@Marjorie_Ray) March 5, 2017

Ryan Rudolph for 2637brew.com

Local restaurant website built with #genesiswp – https://t.co/mPF2jeKsJ9 – parallax pro theme by @studiopress pic.twitter.com/qyRjGcFvXC

— Ryan Rudolph (@ryancrudolph) March 2, 2017

Hans Swolfs for walclimburg.be

Proudly powered by #genesiswp and with ❤ created by myself I present https://t.co/v3Svo3gR7o, an adventure park in Limburg, Belgium.

— Hans Swolfs (@Photastic) March 4, 2017

Yael Reinhardt-Matsliah with a new site based on the GBeaver theme for energyhealinginstitute.org

Another great site built by Yael Reinhardt- Matsliah . She used GBeaver #genesiswp child theme and @BeaverBuilder. https://t.co/mnVGl1cXla

— Beaver World (@wpbeaverworld) March 2, 2017

Matt Ryan for prosplice.com

Just Launched: ProSplice – https://t.co/3l6eploxNj … #genesiswp

— Matt Ryan (@MattRy) February 28, 2017

Best of the rest

Brian Gardner did another edition of StudioPress Live over on Facebook Live, this time on the topic of design. (And if you missed it, don’t worry you can catch the replay).

Join @bgardner in 15 minutes (1:00 CST) for StudioPress Live on Facebook. Today’s topic: Design — https://t.co/orgsCqsQAU #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/z6trQhiS8w

— StudioPress (@studiopress) March 2, 2017

New premium plugin release from Jesse Petersen, Genesis The.me After Entry Widget.

Proud to announce GenesisThe.me After Entry Widget plugin. Buy now to get future features free. https://t.co/Gh68yhoe9g #genesiswp

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) March 4, 2017

EngageWP is giving away a one year subscription to StudioPress Sites.

New: We're giving away a free 1-year #StudioPress Sites Content Plan account!https://t.co/dZHIjz85Pw #genesiswp

— EngageWP (@EngageWP) March 1, 2017

Sridhar shows you how to use Flexbox to display widgets in columns…

Using Flexbox for displaying widgets in columns:https://t.co/jquLXHKE96https://t.co/chrcjv6j0w

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) March 3, 2017

…and he’s also having fun with WordPress coding standards and the Genesis Sample theme.

Genesis Sample's Functions per WordPress PHP Documentation Standards:https://t.co/m6DOS2YFSj#GenesisWP

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) February 27, 2017

—

That’s all for this week.

If you dig what I’m doing I’d love it if you subscribe or if you have something rad to share, go add it!

Till next time, let’s keep Genesis awesome.
